scripts.build: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); if(!fs.existsSync('public'))fs.mkdirSync('public'); if(fs.existsSync('functions'))fs.cpSync('functions', 'public/functions', {recursive:true}); if(fs.existsSync('index.html'))fs.copyFileSync('index.html', 'public/index.html'); console.log('Build completed!');"
scripts.build:win: if not exist public mkdir public && if exist functions xcopy /E /I functions public\functions && if exist index.html copy index.html public\index.html
